title: Parenting in the Age of Omnipresent Screens
description: Pamela Druckerman discusses “The Art of Screen Time” and “Be the Parent, Please,” and Ben Austen talks about “High-Risers: Cabrini-Green and the Fate of American Public Housing.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
